sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A dispraise of the life of a courtier, and a commendacion of the life of the labouryng man Guevara, Antonio de, Bp., d. 1545? Allègre, Antoine. Bryan, Francis, Sir, d. 1550.
[224] p.
In aedibus Richardi Graftoni, typographi regii, [Excusum Londini : Mense Augustii] M.DXLVIII. [1548]
A translation by Sir Francis Bryan of the French translation by Antoine Allègre of the original by Antonio de Guevara. Place of publication and printer's name from colophon. Running title reads: A dispraise of the courtiers life. At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Signatures: a-o. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

A translation by Sir Francis Bryan of the French translation by Antoine Allègre of the original by Antonio de Guevara. Place of publication and printer's name from colophon. Running title reads: A dispraise of the courtiers life. At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Signatures: a-o. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
